attributes.title: HORRIBLE. DONT GET!
attributes.review: I wouldn’t recommend getting this app AT ALL. It slowed my battery down along with making my phone crash multiple times. It also took up a lot of storage on my phone, which is ridiculous.

attributes.title: Review 😇
attributes.review: This app is completely worthless simply because i know a racist, misogynistic, xenophobic, and homophobic person is the face of the company. i would never use this app i gave it one star because it wouldn’t let me give any less.😘😘

attributes.title: SO HORRIBLE.
attributes.review: this is BY FAR the worst app i have ever purchased. i would never recommend it to anyone as it is designed SO POORLY. it keeps making my phone crash and i believe it needs to be removed from the app store immediately.

attributes.title: Ouch
attributes.review: This app is very disorganized and the information on it is very untrue. I would give it 0 stars if possible! Kept crashing and freezing. Can’t believe an app like this is even open. Not sure this is even legit. May be owned by a Russian company?

attributes.title: PLEASE READ THIS!!
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app in the hopes of proudly serving our leader ✨orange✨ and next thing I knew a SWAT team barged through my door, kidnapped my mom and dad, and ate my last powder sugar donut. What jerks! I was excited to eat my donut.. and it’s all because I downloaded this app.
Don’t do it! Save your donuts!!

attributes.title: It’s just horrible
attributes.review: I’m not her about the whole Tik tok thing but when I downloaded it there was a butch of viruses on my phone and any other device I downloaded it on but it’s horrible I had to go get it fixed at a store😐🙄

attributes.title: our glorious orange🍊
attributes.review: i got this app so i could support of course, lord orange. i wanted to be able to see what was going on in the community and get updates on the 2020 race, when i opened the app i was very disappointed. not only did the screen stay frozen at a picture of an orange, but it started to chant weird things. it was like i heard it all around me... “trump 2020”... i still remember it... it was terrifying. anyway would not recommend the app it’s very brain washing💖🥰😝

attributes.title: This app is the worst thing in existence
attributes.review: This app took a FULL MONTH to download and as soon a as I opened it I got hacked by neo-nazis and my phone got flooded with text messages telling me trump and his “hulligans” would be after me and eat my toenails. I am in fear of my life pls don’t download this app.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: I open the app but kept struggling to stay in the app. It continuously crashes and even broke my phone at some point. This app was so disappointing that it should just go away and stay away

attributes.title: Keeps crashing
attributes.review: I keep on trying to open the app and it crashes everytime and runs super slow kinda annoying definitely don’t suggest getting the app
